item.text: Now on the topic of times and seasons, brothers and sisters, you have no need for anything to be written to you.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> you <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="199">quite well</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="2064" class="">come</st> <st data-num="3779">in the same way</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> a <st data-num="2812" class="">thief</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1161">Now</st> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st><n id="1" /> they are <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “There is <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="803" class="">security</st>,”<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5119" class="">then</st> <st data-num="160" class="">sudden</st> <st data-num="3639" class="">destruction</st> <st data-num="2186">comes on</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, <st data-num="5618" class="">like</st> <st data-num="5604">labor pains</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> a <st data-num="1064 2192">pregnant woman</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they will <st data-num="3756 3361">surely not</st> <st data-num="1628" class="">escape</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">for</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> to <st data-num="2638" class="">overtake</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="2812" class="">thief</st> would.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> of the <st data-num="5457" class="">light</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5207" class="">sons</st> of the <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>. We <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> of the <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="3761" class="">nor</st> of the <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st>.

<st data-num="686" class="">So</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">then</st> we must <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2518" class="">sleep</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> the <st data-num="3062" class="">rest</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> must <st data-num="1127">stay alert</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3525" class="">sober</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> those who <st data-num="2518" class="">sleep</st>, <st data-num="2518" class="">sleep</st> at <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> those who <st data-num="3184" class="">get drunk</st> are <st data-num="3184" class="">drunk</st> at <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st>.
But since we are of the day, we must stay sober by putting on the breastplate of faith and love and as a helmet our hope for salvation.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5087" class="">destine</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3709" class="">wrath</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4047" class="">gaining</st> <st data-num="4991" class="">salvation</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

He <st data-num="599" class="">died</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">whether</st> we are <st data-num="1127" class="">alert</st> <st data-num="1535" class="">or</st> <st data-num="2518" class="">asleep</st>,<n id="2" /> we will <st data-num="2198">come to life</st> <st data-num="260" class="">together</st> <st data-num="4862" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.
Therefore encourage one another and build up each other, just as you are in fact doing.
Now we ask you, brothers and sisters, to acknowledge those who labor among you and preside over you in the Lord and admonish you,

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> to <st data-num="2233" class="">esteem</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="5239">most highly</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="1223">because of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st>. <st data-num="1514">Be at peace</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">And</st> we <st data-num="3870" class="">urge</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>, <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3560" class="">admonish</st> the <st data-num="813" class="">undisciplined</st>, <st data-num="3888" class="">comfort</st> the <st data-num="3642" class="">discouraged</st>, <st data-num="472" class="">help</st> the <st data-num="772" class="">weak</st>, <st data-num="3114">be patient</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">toward</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.

<st data-num="3708" class="">See</st> that <st data-num="3361" class="">no</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">one</st> <st data-num="591">pays back</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st> to <st data-num="5100" class="">anyone</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3842" class="">always</st> <st data-num="1377" class="">pursue</st> what is <st data-num="18" class="">good</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="240">one another</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st>.
<st data-num="3842" class="">Always</st> <st data-num="5463" class="">rejoice</st>,
<st data-num="89" class="">constantly</st> <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st>,

<st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">everything</st> <st data-num="2168">give thanks</st>. <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> is <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">for</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>.
Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4570" class="">extinguish</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>.
Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1848" class="">treat</st> <st data-num="4394" class="">prophecies</st> <st data-num="1848">with contempt</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1381" class="">examine</st> <st data-num="3956">all things</st>; <st data-num="2722">hold fast</st> to what is <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st>.
Stay away from every form of evil.
Now may the God of peace himself make you completely holy and may your spirit and soul and body be kept entirely blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ.

He who <st data-num="2564" class="">calls</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> is <st data-num="4103" class="">trustworthy</st>, and <st data-num="3739">he</st> will <st data-num="2532" class="">in fact</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">do</st> this.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="80">Brothers and sisters</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>.

<st data-num="782" class="">Greet</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> a <st data-num="40" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="5370" class="">kiss</st>.

I <st data-num="3726" class="">call</st> on <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="3726">solemnly</st> in the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> to have this <st data-num="1992" class="">letter</st> <st data-num="314" class="">read</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st>.<n id="2" />
The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.
